cmp: 分 (to divide/minute/(a measure word)/(a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter), part)
mng: powder, cosmetic face powder, food prepared from starch, noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour, whitewash, white, pink

exm.mng: bean vermicelli, mung bean starch noodles, Chinese vermicelli, cellophane noodles, fan (loanword), enthusiast for sb or sth
to crush, to smash, to shatter
dust, airborne powder, solid particulate matter
to paint, to whitewash, to decorate, plaster, fig. to gloss over, to cover up
